name: Crongdor the Barbarian
description: Crongdor the Barbarian is a top-down action game with loads of over-the-top blood and guts and mayhem! Play the game, make some maps, and pull the source code apart with us and chat about how it was made.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7/8.1/10 Processor: 2 GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible driver Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7/8.1/10 Processor: 3 GHz processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible driver Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: Any
